questions.statement: Should schools require students to wear uniforms?

For.fact1: Uniforms can reduce bullying and peer pressure.
For.fact2: Uniforms can help students focus on their studies.
For.fact3: Uniforms can create a sense of unity and school spirit.

Against.fact1: Uniforms can stifle individuality and self-expression.
Against.fact2: Uniforms can be expensive for families.
Against.fact3: Uniforms may not be practical for all activities.
